medium: Lithographs on hand-made paper in linen portfolio
title: Study for "Haircut", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark, annotated in r LL: [NA 1990]; LR: [W.P.]
description: Full length view of a man naked from the waist up; he sits in a chair facing forward while he cuts his own hair; the words \"Haircut\" inscribed, UC
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
